channel.title: mapping the kernel
channel.description: Recent content on mapping the kernel

item.title: Scalog: Seamless Reconfiguration and Total Order in a Scalable Shared Log
item.description: Link: https://www.usenix.org/conference/nsdi20/presentation/ding Scalog Scalog is another shared log similar to CORFU. Like CORFU, it has Data Layer that stores logs. Unlike CORFU, it has no sequencer, however, it has Ordering Layer.

item.title: Apache BookKeeper
item.description: Link: https://bookkeeper.apache.org https://doi.org/10.1145/2433140.2433144 Apache BookKeeper The Apache BookKeeper is open-source log storage with durability, strong consistency, and high performance.

item.title: CORFU: A Distributed Shared Log
item.description: Link: https://doi.org/10.1145/2535930 What is CORFU? CORFU is distributed shared log to support strong consistency, fault tolerance, durability and total order. It can be building block of various distributed systems like:
